channel.title: Comments on: Battenberg Cake – Daring Bakers Challenge June 2012

item.title: By: MandyM
item.dc:creator: MandyM
item.description:
Your Battenberg is lovely! You got the squares beautifully even, which seemed to be one of the biggest challenges a lot of DBers struggled with.
I've seen a Battenberg done with a layer of marzipan then a layer of rolled fondant, like a celebration cake, so you could give that a try if you do enjoy marzipan :)
Thanks for taking part in the June challenge!
item.content:encoded:
Your Battenberg is lovely! You got the squares beautifully even, which seemed to be one of the biggest challenges a lot of DBers struggled with.

I’ve seen a Battenberg done with a layer of marzipan then a layer of rolled fondant, like a celebration cake, so you could give that a try if you do enjoy marzipan ðŸ™‚

Thanks for taking part in the June challenge!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/battenberg-cake-daring-bakers-challenge-june-2012/comment-page-1/#comment-6302">Beta Gal</a>.
Thanks Beta Gal Yes, the recipe said pink which is what our host used - and hers looked stunning. I decided to see how purple went - although I think the pink is more dainty and suited it better. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Beta Gal.

Thanks Beta Gal
Yes, the recipe said pink which is what our host used – and hers looked stunning. I decided to see how purple went – although I think the pink is more dainty and suited it better. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Eric

item.description: Thank for sharing all the pics =D they look very tasty ! =D
item.content:encoded: Thank for sharing all the pics =D they look very tasty ! =D

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: Cute cake and well executed. But your cake is purple, did you use a different coloured dye?
item.content:encoded: Cute cake and well executed. But your cake is purple, did you use a different coloured dye?

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: It's beautiful! I love the lavender color and your squares are so even!
item.content:encoded: It’s beautiful! I love the lavender color and your squares are so even!
